mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_no, title, content, file_name, store_file_name, member_no, board_no) VALUES (seq_post_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNo}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: SELECT post_no, title, content, create_at, file_name, store_file_name, member_no, board_no FROM post WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
SELECT post_no, title, content, create_at, file_name, store_file_name, member_no, board_no FROM post WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY post_no DESC
mapper.update: update post set title = #{updatedPost.title}, content = #{updatedPost.content}, file_name = #{updatedPost.fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_file_name = #{updatedPost.storeFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where post_no = #{postNo}
